mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TB_FOR_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardtype} AND IS_DEL = 'N'

SELECT TB.LIST_NUM ,TB.BOARD_IDX ,TB.BOARD_TITLE ,TB.USER_ID ,TB.USER_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(TB.UPDT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDT_DATE ,TB.VIEW_CNT ,TB.FILE_CNT FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS LIST_NUM, TB.BOARD_IDX ,TB.BOARD_TITLE ,TB.USER_ID ,TB.USER_NM ,TB.UPDT_DATE ,TB.VIEW_CNT ,TB.FILE_CNT FROM (SELECT TB.*, COUNT(TBF.BOARD_IDX) AS FILE_CNT FROM TB_FOR_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FOR_BOARD_FILES TBF ON TB.BOARD_IDX = TBF.BOARD_IDX WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY TB.BOARD_IDX) TB, (SELECT @rownum:=0) temp WHERE TB.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND TB.IS_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY TB.BOARD_IDX DESC) TB LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
